channel.title: Grading on A minimal Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Grading on A minimal Hugo website

item.title: Does e-grading lead to less student engagement with feedback?
item.description: For one of my courses this semester I’m using Blackboard Grade Center to have students submit their assignments and for me to assess them. I actually prefer to assess/correct assignments with old-fashioned pen and paper; I think it’s a bit quicker. But every semester I’m faced with a pile of correcting, whether electronic or physical, I try to start by using e-grading. One thing I’m noticing is that my students don’t necessarily seem too engaged with my feedback I’ve provided through the Grade Center.
